paragraph: Top Shot features the photo with the most votes from the previous day’s Daily Dozen, 12 photos selected by the Your Shot editors. The photo our community has voted as their favorite is showcased on the @natgeoyourshot Instagram account. Click here to vote for tomorrow’s Top Shot.Your Shot photographer Asher Thye came across this little lizard jumping between Purple Heart plants, also known as Setcreasea pallida, outside his home. Asher writes, “Despite his bright green color, I’m surprised I saw him - he was no more than three inches in length. I was lucky to get this shot before a passing car scared him off into the bushes nearby!” Photograph by Asher ThyeTop Shot features the photo with the most votes from the previous day’s Daily Dozen, 12 photos selected by the Your Shot editors.
